title: Dark Matters: Aftermaths
description: The Dark Matters series continues with AFTERMATHS, featuring two tales set in the wake of different disastrous futures which offer damning evidence of the depths the desperate will sink to.In "The Seeding" a frontier farmer battles against ecological adversity and the threat of his rivals and neighbours with the most underhand of tactics.And in "The Diminishing Returns" an isolated survivor and his last, best friend learn that companionship and survival make for untrustworthy bedfellows...These are stories that step out of the light, where only the dark matters...
author: Andrew Leon Hudson
